title: Umadevi Diamond - Novel Updates
author: พนมเทียน
description: This story took place in the ‘60 period. At that time, Thailand was still rich with forests and wild animals, hunting wild life isn’t illegal. The story will lead you on an adventure to the depths of the ancient forest, drive into the mysterious journey, discover the supernatural and mystical legend, fight with the evil occult, witness many things beyond your belief.>
